Course Description:
AN INTRODUCTION TO FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING. A SOLE
PROPRIETORSHIP WILL BE ASSUMED. THE COMPLETE
ACCOUNTING CYCLE WILL BE STUDIED AS IT RELATES TO A SERVICE BUSINESS AND A MERCHANDISING BUSINESS. ADDITIONAL TOPICS INCLUDE FINANCIAL REPORTING AND ANALYSIS, SPECIALIZED JOURNALS, INTERNAL CONTROL, SHORT-TERM LIQUID ASSETS, AND INVENTORIES.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
